channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: New policies are making life harder for trans people — and prompting big financial decisions
item.description: White House executive orders and legislation in many states have targeted the rights and protections of trans people. For some, that has meant increas...

item.title: Why was Kirk killed? Evidence paints complicated picture of alleged assassin
item.description: The killing of conservative activist Charlie Kirk has unleashed a frenzy of recrimination — and finger-pointing. But the suspect's politics may be les...

item.title: CDC's vaccine advisers meet this week. Here's how they could affect policy
item.description: Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy, Jr. chose everyone in the group. Their votes could affect vaccine access for certain childhood vaccines and and th...

item.title: Foreign influencers are doing their best to spin the Charlie Kirk assassination
item.description: Russia, Iran and China have all attempted to shape the narrative, but so far, their influence has been relatively minor, experts say.

item.title: Kirk shooting videos spread online, even to viewers who didn't want to see them
item.description: Graphic videos of the Charlie Kirk shooting spread widely online, raising concerns over the emotional and political toll of exposure to violent imager...

item.title: Togo leader's sister-in-law arrested after calling for end to family rule
item.description: Marguerite Gnakadé has become a vocal critic of Togo's long-serving leader Faure Gnassingbé.

item.title: Australia announces higher emissions cuts by 2035
item.description: The country is one of the world's biggest carbon emitters per capita.

item.title: Starbucks workers sue over company's new dress code's costs to them
item.description: Starbucks workers in three states sued, saying it broke the law when it changed its dress code but refused to reimburse employees who had to buy new c...

item.title: Newborn baby buried alive in India fights for her life
item.description: The 20-day-old girl was found by chance when a shepherd heard faint cries from under a mound of earth.

item.title: ABC pre-empts "Jimmy Kimmel Live!" over Kimmel's Charlie Kirk comments
item.description: ABC's announcement came as media giants Nexstar and Sinclair announced they would preempt Jimmy Kimmel's show indefinitely on all their stations over ...

item.title: 9/17: CBS Evening News

item.title: Hurricane Helene displaced thousands of students. Some struggled to get back on track with school
3 police officers killed, 2 wounded in York County, Pennsylvania, shooting; suspect dead
item.description: Three police officers were fatally shot and two others were wounded in a shooting Wednesday.

item.title: Trump's U.K. state visit turns from royal pomp to trade and diplomacy

item.title: Jimmy Kimmel taken off air over Charlie Kirk comments
item.description: The late-night host said on Monday that Trump's allies were "doing everything they can to score political points from" Kirk's death.

item.title: Trump clashes with Australian journalist over business deals in office
item.description: The US leader said the journalist was "hurting Australia very much" as he said he would meet the country's PM "very soon".

item.title: Shooting kills 3 officers and wounds 2 more in rural Pennsylvania. Police say the shooter is dead
item.description: Authorities have been investigating a shooting that killed three officers and wounded two more in rural southern Pennsylvania.

item.title: Suspect in Charlie Kirk killing feared being shot by police before surrendering, sheriff says
